sub_title: PhD fellow Marie Curie Early Stage Researcher (ESR) at the University of Groningen and the GLOBE institute, University of Copenhagen.
summary:
Master in Sustainability, conservation, and spatial planning from AgroParisTech and the MNHN of Paris with a Bachelor's degree in Biology from the Universidad Cayetano Heredia in Peru. Experience in the area of genetics and conservation.
My passion for combine genetics and conservation also took me to make different internships in different countries with the objective of understanding better the mechanisms of genetic adaptation in different animals as camels, south american fur seals and currently atlantic walruses.
